text: Do you mean the screen is frozen? Try exiting out of the program CTRL + X) and seeing if your VM is also frozen. If so, try shutting down your VM and computer, and then rebooting both. Also, if VM freezes frequently, try not to have other applications, such as Slack, open at the same time your VM is running.
